intro-item1: Library of articles from the best Ibero-American and South African journals
intro-item2: SciELO (Scientific Electronic Library Online) publishes weekly over one thousand new articles from the best iberoamerican journals and South Africa
intro-item3: These articles communicate research results from the following scientific Ã¡reas: Agriculture, Biology, Exact and Earth, Health, Engineering, Social Sciences and Humanities
intro-item4: Overall, SciELO covers more than one thousand journals and over 600 thousand articles.
